name: Fetch Depth Variation
question: Does fetch-depth=0 (full clone) produce a different count than fetch-depth=1 (shallow)?

hypothesis.reasoning: fetch-depth changes how much history is fetched but the clone event itself should be counted the same way. Expected: same delta as Day 2. Unique delta 0 because the same bot identity ran on Day 2.

actions.notes: Run with fetch-depth=0 (full history). Compare delta to Day 2 baseline.

results.notes: Note: unique_per_day predicts +1 unique (new day), current/multiplier predict +0 (same bot). This experiment differentiates unique formulas.
